titleInfo.title: 1818 Apr. 22, Cherokee Agency [to] John C. Calhoun

subject.geographic: United States -- Office of Indian Affairs -- Cherokee Agency, East .

mods.note: This is a copy of a letter dated April 22, 1818 from Return J. Meigs of the Cherokee Agency to John C. Calhoun requesting the sum of $3472.00 for payment to John and Lewis Ross for expenditures in the Cherokee Agency. Following is a copy of a notice from John C. Calhoun approving the payment.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
